titles: An humble testimony unto the goodness and severity of God in his dealing with sinful churches and nations, or, The only way to deliver a sinful nation from utter ruine by impendent judgments, in a discourse on the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, Luk. 13, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 / by John Owen.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Luke XIII, 1-5 --  Criticism, interpretation, etc.
